item.title: Yamaha PSR-28 Keyboard - Vintage and Functional
item.description:
FOR SALE: Yamaha PSR-28 Portable Keyboard

A classic keyboard from the late 90s, fully functional. Excellent for retro sound enthusiasts or beginners. Minor cosmetic wear consistent with age.

Suggested Price: 150 EUR / 1120 DKK

IMPORTANT: International EU Shipping available. Buyer pays all costs (item + tracked shipping + insurance) via PayPal. Contact me before purchasing to confirm the total cost.

Contact: Please email hitrate@gmail.com for a quick quote, trade offers, or lease inquiries.
